thread.title: Jahlil Okafor entered the game with his warmup shirt still on
thread.title_full: Jahlil Okafor entered the game with his warmup shirt still on

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Jahlil Okafor entered the game with his warmup shirt still on
text:
He was just really, really excited to play.
Jahlil Okafor was so eager to get out on the court Wednesday night against the Mavs that he forgot something.
You forget something, Jahlil? pic.twitter.com/zjNJIfny3x 
— SportsCenter (@SportsCenter) February 2, 2017 This is like those dreams we all have, where we wake up late (in the dream) and rush to work, only to realize that we have forgotten one really important article of clothing. Be it pants or shirt, it’s always super embarrassing. This is kind of like what happened to Okafor tonight, only in his case, he’s just wearing too much clothing. 
Jimmy Butler did something similar just a few weeks ago during a Hornets vs. Bulls matchup.
Tony Allen did it in 2014 . 
Turns out this happens fairly often.
